channel.title: Still Trying to Get my Account Back
channel.description: I've been trying to contact staff for awhile, like months. I'm not going to name anyone but hopefully I'll get more help by posting. Some people may remember me from a long time ago or they might not. Thanks.

item.title: Still Trying to Get my Account Back
item.dc:creator: @marine5289 marine5289
item.description:
@marine5289 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:7, topic:424171”]I did message Moparisthebest

I waited a LONG time and had no response.

As far as I’m aware Moparisthebest changed your email, then you vanished. Message Mopman on the IRC, he is also an administrator (He can be found at #mopar).[/quote]

Will do thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Still Trying to Get my Account Back

I waited a LONG time and had no response.
